headline: Ask HN: Which concurrency problem is best to compare CSP and memory sharing?
description:
I'm looking for an appropriate concurrent example to show the differences between Communicating Sequential Processes and memory sharing.

I would implement the CSP version using either Go or Occam.

Which concurrent problem would be best solved using CSP, in which the memory-sharing solution gets too complicated at scale?
